sn51.16:1.1: “Mendicants, all the ascetics and brahmins in the past,
sn51.16:1.3: or present who are mighty and powerful have become so by developing and cultivating the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.16:2.2: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm …
sn51.16:2.6: All the ascetics and brahmins in the past,
sn51.16:2.8: or present who are mighty and powerful have become so by developing and cultivating the four bases of psychic power.”
